pkgmetadata.longdescription: Monotonic Association on Zero-Inflated Data // Methods for calculating and testing the significance of pairwise monotonic association from and based on the work of Pimentel (2009) doi:10.4135/9781412985291.n2. Computation of association of vectors from one or multiple sets can be performed in parallel thanks to the packages 'foreach' and 'doMC'.
